actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to report to Congress on the long-term needs of veterans in the State of New Jersey for nursing home care and on the feasibility of providing a State home construction grant to that State to assist in the construction of a new nursing home in central New Jersey to meet the nursing home needs of veterans.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to: (1) conduct a study of the long-term needs of veterans in New Jersey for nursing home care and the adequacy of existing facilities; and (2) report on the feasibility and desirability of making a grant to New Jersey for the construction in central New Jersey of a new State veterans' nursing home.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to report to Congress on the long-term needs of veterans in the State of New Jersey for nursing home care and on the feasibility of providing a State home construction grant to that State to assist in the construction of a new nursing home in central New Jersey to meet the nursing home needs of veterans.
